message: Let's end this quickly. Take this generous offer while it still holds value!
This is a fair split, and it will still be worth more to me than your offer. Let's end this now and both get a decent amount.
I'm willing to be fair, Bob, but your offer was too low. This is my final offer before I start getting serious!
Alice, this is a good deal for both of us. My money is losing value fast, and I'm willing to compromise. Let's end this before the inflation eats away any more of our gains.
